blog.name: ununquadius
blog.title: Drarry Chats (Mostly)
blog.description: AO3: ununquadius  // Follows, comments and likes from azaharperezoso Feel free to correct my mistakes, English is not my first language | Header by @cubedcoffeecake

title: SEPTEMBER: BACK TO HOGWARTS
body:
Read on AO3 | Drarry, Royalty AU | 294 words

Thanks a lot to @erin-riwen for the September 2018 prompt “Back to Hogwarts” that inspired this fic. All the love for you, I hope you like this little AU. And thanks to goldfish for the beta <3

*

The castle appeared in the distance as he remembered it: big, dark, and with the aura of power that made the kingdom so famous.

The last time Harry had been at Hogwarts was three years ago. Then he had talked to King Lucius and had left, pursued by some of the best knights of the Malfoy kingdom. It had been another time. A time of war and death.

Now he was here for other things, and he feared he’d leave with the Malfoy army behind him again.

Harry and his knights entered Hogwarts, and were lead to the throne room.

“Prince Harry,” Lucius greeted with that drawl Harry hated so much. “How wonderful to see you again.”

“King Lucius, Queen Narcissa.”

He and his knights stood several meters from the throne. They knew that what they had come to say wouldn’t be well received.

“How strange that it’s a prince who brings us Lady Astoria’s answer,” Narcissa pointed out.

Harry took a deep breath, and took a mental tour of all the weapons hidden in his robes.

“I’m afraid Lady Astoria’s answer…” He knew the king and queen knew the answer already. He could feel it in the frown of Narcissa’s eyebrows and in the quirk of Lucius’s mouth. Lord Ronald coughed behind him, urging him to finish. “Her actual words were ‘I don’t want to marry that ponce’.”

“You know what this means,” Lucius said.

And Harry knew. He had known since he had left his home, and so he had an answer ready.

“I’ll take her place. I’ll marry Prince Draco.”

He ignored the gasps behind him. And the surprised faces in front of him. He had agreed to this a long time ago, when he and Draco had planned it together.

summary:
Someone: My daughter wants to become a doctor when she grows up so she can help sick kids. 
Harry: My children wants to be...
body:
Someone: My daughter wants to become a doctor when she grows up so she can help sick kids. 
Harry: My children wants to be porcupines so they can stab people with their butt.

blog.description: An automated feed for the Tom/Harry and Voldemort/Harry AO3 tags. Not a fic recs blog.

title: Dark Lord's Omega
description:
by Slydragon666

Harry has been missing for months after being sent home to the Dursley, which don’t remember a Harry ever living with them. With the newly returned Dark Lord on the run, the Ministry denying his existence, and the Order of Phoenix straining to find their missing Harry Potter and protect the Prophecy and the wizarding world from death eaters and the dark lord. Severus goes to the next death eater meeting to find almost all their questions answered only to have new questions appear.

Words: 2261, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death, Rape/Non-Con, Underage
  • Categories: F/M, M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Draco Malfoy, Severus Snape, Albus Dumbledore, Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Lucius Malfoy, Narcissa Black Malfoy, Poppy Pomfrey, Death Eater Characters, Order of the Phoenix, Kingsley Shacklebolt, Alastor “Mad-Eye” Moody, Molly Weasley, Arthur Weasley, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Nagini (Harry Potter)
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Draco Malfoy/Harry Potter, Draco Malfoy/Voldemort, Draco Malfoy/Harry Potter/Voldemort, Harry Potter/Severus Snape
  • Additional Tags: Horcruxes, Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Alpha Voldemort (Harry Potter), Alpha Severus Snape, Alpha Lucius Malfoy, Omega Draco Malfoy, Omega Harry Potter, Psychological Torture, Blood and Torture, Mating Cycles/In Heat, Mythical Beings & Creatures, Sexual Violence, Dom/sub, Abuse, Domestic Violence, Majority Early, Hogwarts Fifth Year, Rape/Non-con Elements, Spy Severus Snape, Homosexuality, One-Sided Relationship

summary: An idea came to me, and it keeps making me laugh: Voldemort as a magical girl. Which then, promptly turned into each Horcrux...
question: An idea came to me, and it keeps making me laugh: Voldemort as a magical girl. Which then, promptly turned into each Horcrux being a different magical girl on the 'team'.
answer: I’d pay good money to see Voldemort and the Horcruxes do magical girl transformations XD Oh, gods, just make it a full Sailor Moon AU with Harry as Tuxedo Mask as well!

blog.name: sevironic
blog.title: sevironic
blog.description:
Snape was a monster who saved people.
#Lucissa
#Grindeldore
#RakepickOwnsMyAss
#HogwartsMystery

summary: Snape haters remind me of Melissandre haters in GOT... they can't accept that an horrible person can also contribute a lot to...
body:
Snape haters remind me of Melissandre haters in GOT… they can’t accept that an horrible person can also contribute a lot to the victory against a common ennemy.

They can’t accept that doing bad and unforgivable things doesn’t prevent someone from being selfless and saving people.

So… here is my tribute :

RIP Severus Snape, the war hero. The man who had nothing to gain in fixing his mistakes and protecting someone else’s child.

The man who still tried to protect his enemies.

The man who accepted to kill his boss against his will so he would gain Voldemort’s trust.

The man who made an unbreakable vow so Draco didn’t have to become a murderer at 17.

The man who tormented,killed, healed, protected and saved.

So… here is my tribute :

RIP Severus Snape, the war hero. The man who had nothing to gain in fixing his mistakes and protecting someone else’s child.

The man who still tried to protect his enemies.

The man who accepted to kill his boss against his will so he would gain Voldemort’s trust.

The man who made an unbreakable vow so Draco didn’t have to become a murderer at 17.

The man who tormented,killed, healed, protected and saved.
trail.content:
Snape haters remind me of Melissandre haters in GOT… they can’t accept that an horrible person can also contribute a lot to the victory against a common ennemy.

They can’t accept that doing bad and unforgivable things doesn’t prevent someone from being selfless and saving people.

So… here is my tribute :

RIP Severus Snape, the war hero. The man who had nothing to gain in fixing his mistakes and protecting someone else’s child.

The man who still tried to protect his enemies.

The man who accepted to kill his boss against his will so he would gain Voldemort’s trust.

The man who made an unbreakable vow so Draco didn’t have to become a murderer at 17.

The man who tormented,killed, healed, protected and saved.

blog.name: baldeviejayloshumagilonnie
blog.title: Baldeviejayloshumagilonnie
blog.description:
Rants, wanderings, theories,AU plot points and other absolutely insane things that spring from my mind and waiting to be wrote down at a moments notice. Fandoms: Doctor who. Sarah Jane adventures. Once upon a time. Descendants. Simpson’s. Futurama. Mcu movies agent carter and agents of shield. Sitcoms (cheers golden girls Frasier friends scrubs I love Lucy etc). Stranger things. Power rangers 2017. Classic Disney cartoons (duck tales goof troop tale spin recess Fillmore brandy and mr whiskers. Dave the barbarian quack pack rescue rangers recess etc). Classic Nickelodeon cartoons (hey Arnold. Rugrats and their films. Wild thornberry’s. All grown up. Rocket power. CatDog. Etc). Classic cartoons network cartoons (fosters home for imagination friends. Ed Edd and Eddy. Johnny bravo. Dexter’s lab. Power puff girls. Code name kids next door etc). Looney tunes. Flintstones. Classic Disney. Jiggy McCue. Star Wars (films only.). Star Trek (all series and films but not the expanded universe). Charlie Bone. Harry Potter and fantastic beasts (cursed child DID NOT HAPPEN). Live action Disney remakes (beat is probably jungle book). Dceu. Arrowverse. Gotham. Riordanverse etc

Ships. 62 and counting etc

Only ships healthy non problematic ships so if I thinks is unhealthy or problematic I will say so

Henry mills should have had a boyfriend in season five

This is a Ben Florian, Bal, Mitchell Hope, Mal Bertha, Doug son of Dopey and Weasley family appreciation blog. If I hate a character it has nothing to do with their race gender or orientation. I will always be their abhorrent personality

summary: The superpowers I think they’d have
body:

  1. Harry. Durability
  2. Ron. Empathy
  3. Ginny. Supers strength

summary: Harry Potter: The Gryffindor boys playing Dungeons and Dragons
title: Harry Potter: The Gryffindor boys playing Dungeons and Dragons
body:
Dean (the DM): You walk along the Plane of Fire, when a Fire Elemental bursts out, it’s-

Seamus (a pyromaniac Dragonborn)*interupting*: I use Fire Breath

Dean *sighs*: It’s a Fire Elemental…

Seamus *shrugs and grins*: Fight fire with fire

Dean: You know what, fine. Roll a d20

Seamus *rolls before cheering*: Natural 20

Dean: Ok. You use Fire Breath, and nothing happens because it’s a f*cking Fire Elemental
